TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Pierre_Nkurunziza, title = Pierre_Nkurunziza, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Nkurunziza} }

S.FORM: Pierre Nkurunziza 12 bulad 18 demiad, Pierre Nkurunziza, u misingkiway. 1963 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Burundi ayza sa ci Pierre Nkurunziza, micakat a demiad sa i 2005 a mihca 4 bulad 26 demiad.

Pierre Nkoronziza 12 bolad 18 demiad, Pierre Nkoronziza, o misingkiway. 1963 a mihca nalecohan) o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Borondi ayza sa ci Pierre Nkoronziza, micakat a demiad sa i 2005 a mihca 4 bolad 26 demiad.
